CustomField.description: Used to populate the header of defect letters (conga templates.)
CustomField.formula:
"State of California, " & $CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.FirstName__c & " " & IF ( ISBLANK($CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.MiddleInitial__c), "", $CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.MiddleInitial__c &" ") & $CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.LastName__c & IF ( ISBLANK ($CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.Suffix__c), ", Governor" , " "& $CustomMetadata.GovernorName__mdt.Governor_Full_Name.Suffix__c & ", Governor") &BR()& IF( Registration_Type__c <> "Entertainment Work", "Department of Industrial Relations" &BR()& "Division of Labor Standards Enforcement" &BR()& "Registration Services Unit" &BR()& "1515 Clay Street, Ste. 1902" &BR()& "Oakland, CA 94612" &BR()&
"Phone: " & Registration__r.Registration_Office_Telephone_Number__c &BR()& "Fax: " + Registration__r.Registration_Office_Fax_Number__c ,
"Department of Industrial Relations" &BR()& "Division of Labor Standards Enforcement" &BR()& "Entertainment Work Permit Unit" &BR()& "6150 Van Nuys Blvd. #100" &BR()& "Van Nuys, CA 91401" &BR()& "Phone: " & Registration__r.Registration_Office_Telephone_Number__c &BR() )
CustomField.label: DLSE Contact Details
